description: I'm Eng. Mohamed Gomaa ISTQB FL Certified who graduated from Information Technology Institute (ITI) , Digital Egyptian Pioneers (DEPI) and Faculty Of Engineer Alexandria University and i got the prize of the best graduation project from ministry of communications and information technology for presenting best project in software testing , I Worked as IT Exective in Zahran Market Management for 8 Months, Now i specialized in software Testing Manual & Api and Automation, i have projects in Manual, Automation Testing for real and demo projects.

timeline.content: Graduated from ITI and finished all KPIs
Developed Real Full Stack E-Commerce Website for Api and Automation testing [ Java Selenium , Typescript Playwright, Java Rest Assured]
Started Software Testing Track at Information Technology Institute (ITI)
Got The Best Prize Award For The Best Graduation Project
Start Working As It Exective In Zahran Market Management.
Traveled to Saudi Arabia for one month
Completed Military Service in Police Investigation.
Graduated From Alexandria University, Faculty Of Engineer.
Graduated From Alexandria Technical College Computer Science.
